name: hatching-triage
label: Hatching Triage
description: A state-of-the-art malware analysis sandbox, with all the features you need. High-volume sample submission in a customizable environment with detections and configuration extraction for many malware families.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: The service-based URL to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: API key that is configured for your account for using the Hatching Triage APIs.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.description: Retrieves a detailed list of samples based on the parameters that you have specified.
operations.title: Query Samples

parameters.title: Subset
parameters.name: subset
parameters.tooltip: Select a subset to control the data included in the response based on your selection. If not specified the default value is owned.
parameters.description: (Optional) Select a subset to control the data included in the response based on your selection. If not specified the default value is owned.

operations.description: Submit a file or an URL for the analysis.
operations.title: Submit Sample

parameters.title: Type of Sample
parameters.name: kind
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of submission that you want to perform for the analysis.
parameters.description: Specify the type of submission that you want to perform for the analysis.

file.name: input
file.title: Type
file.description: Choose between Attachment ID or a File IRI.

file.name: value
file.title: Reference ID
file.description: Reference ID that is used to access the attachment metadata from the FortiSOARâ„¢ Attachments module. In the playbook, if you select 'Attachment ID', this defaults to the {{vars.attachment_id}} value or if you select 'File IRI', then this defaults to the {{vars.file_iri}} value.

url.name: url
url.title: URL
url.tooltip: Specify the URL that you want to submit for the analysis.
url.description: Specify the URL that you want to submit for the analysis.

url.name: fetch
url.title: Fetch the File from the URL
url.description: (Optional) Fetch the file from the URL. The URL is downloaded as file instead of executed directly.
url.tooltip: Fetch the file from the URL. The URL is downloaded as file instead of executed directly.

parameters.title: Target
parameters.name: target
parameters.tooltip: Manually specify the filename of the sample. If not specified, the filename of the attached file is used.
parameters.description: (Optional) Manually specify the filename of the sample. If not specified, the filename of the attached file is used.

parameters.title: Interactive
parameters.name: interactive
parameters.tooltip: If set to true, the analysis profile must be chosen manually after static analysis has finished. The default value is false.
parameters.description: (Optional) If set to true, the analysis profile must be chosen manually after static analysis has finished. The default value is false.

parameters.title: Password
parameters.name: password
parameters.tooltip: A password that may be used to decrypt the provided file, usually an archive (zip/rar/etc).
parameters.description: (Optional) A password that may be used to decrypt the provided file, usually an archive (zip/rar/etc).

parameters.title: Profiles
parameters.name: profiles
parameters.tooltip: A mapping of one or more files to one or more profiles.
parameters.description: (Optional) A mapping of one or more files to one or more profiles.

parameters.title: User Tags
parameters.name: user_tags
parameters.tooltip: An array of user-defined strings that lets the user mark a sample. The resulting tags will be embedded in the reports. The total size cannot exceed 1kB and tags cannot be empty.
parameters.description: (Optional) An array of user-defined strings that lets the user mark a sample. The resulting tags will be embedded in the reports. The total size cannot exceed 1kB and tags cannot be empty.

parameters.title: Timeout
parameters.name: timeout
parameters.tooltip: Specify the timeout of the analysis.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the timeout of the analysis.

parameters.title: Network
parameters.name: network
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of network routing to use. The default value is internet.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the type of network routing to use. The default value is internet.

operations.description: Retrieves the sample details based on the sample ID that you have specified.
operations.title: Get Sample

parameters.title: Sample ID
parameters.name: sample_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sample ID whose details you want to retrieve from Hatching Triage.
parameters.description: Specify the sample ID whose details you want to retrieve from Hatching Triage.

operations.description: Retrieves a short summary of the sample and its analysis tasks based on the sample ID that you have specified.
operations.title: Get Sample Summary

parameters.title: Sample ID
parameters.name: sample_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sample ID whose details you want to retrieve from Hatching Triage.
parameters.description: Specify the sample ID whose details you want to retrieve from Hatching Triage.

operations.description: When a sample is in the static_analysis status, a profile should be selected in order to continue.
operations.title: Set Sample Profile

parameters.title: Sample ID
parameters.name: sample_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sample ID for which you want to set the profile.
parameters.description: Specify the sample ID for which you want to set the profile.

parameters.title: Auto
parameters.name: auto
parameters.tooltip: Whether to have the system automatically select profiles.
parameters.description: (Optional) Whether to have the system automatically select profiles.

parameters.title: Pick
parameters.name: pick
parameters.tooltip: If an archive was submitted, the set of files to run with automatic profiles.
parameters.description: (Optional) If an archive was submitted, the set of files to run with automatic profiles.

parameters.title: Profiles
parameters.name: profiles
parameters.tooltip: A mapping of one or more files to one or more profiles.
parameters.description: (Optional) A mapping of one or more files to one or more profiles.

operations.description: Retrieves the generated static report based on the sample ID that you have specified.
operations.title: Get Static Report

parameters.title: Sample ID
parameters.name: sample_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sample ID for which you want to retrieve the report.
parameters.description: Specify the sample ID for which you want to retrieve the report.

operations.description: Retrieves the generated Triage Report for a single task based on the sample ID and task ID that you have provided.
operations.title: Get Report Triage

parameters.title: Sample ID
parameters.name: sample_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sample ID for which you want to retrieve the report.
parameters.description: Specify the sample ID for which you want to retrieve the report.

parameters.title: Task ID
parameters.name: task_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the task_id ID for which you want to retrieve the report.
parameters.description: Specify the task_id ID for which you want to retrieve the report.

operations.description: Get the detailed list of profiles.
operations.title: Get Profiles

operations.description: Create a new profile based on the parameters that you have specified.
operations.title: Create Profile

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify a unique name for the profile.
parameters.description: Specify a unique name for the profile.

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tags
parameters.tooltip: Specify the set of tags that is used to match this profile to samples.
parameters.description: Specify the set of tags that is used to match this profile to samples.

parameters.title: Timeout
parameters.name: timeout
parameters.tooltip: Specify the timeout of the analysis in seconds.
parameters.description: Specify the timeout of the analysis in seconds.

parameters.title: Network
parameters.name: network
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of networking that should be used when running the sample.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the type of networking that should be used when running the sample.

operations.description: Update the profile based on the parameters specified. The stored profile is overwritten, so it is important that the submitted profile has all fields.
operations.title: Update Profile

parameters.title: Profile ID
parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the profile ID of the profile that you want to update.
parameters.description: Specify the profile ID of the profile that you want to update.

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify a unique name for the profile.
parameters.description: Specify a unique name for the profile.

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tags
parameters.tooltip: Specify the set of tags that is used to match this profile to samples.
parameters.description: Specify the set of tags that is used to match this profile to samples.

parameters.title: Timeout
parameters.name: timeout
parameters.tooltip: Specify the timeout of the analysis in seconds.
parameters.description: Specify the timeout of the analysis in seconds.

parameters.title: Network
parameters.name: network
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of networking that should be used when running the sample.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the type of networking that should be used when running the sample.

operations.description: Delete the profile based on the profile ID that you have specified.
operations.title: Delete Profile

parameters.title: Profile ID
parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the profile ID of the profile that you want to delete.
parameters.description: Specify the profile ID of the profile that you want to delete.

operations.description: The Search API endpoint supports all filters and queries which can be used through the web interface, and allow you to search available analyses for a range of IoCs or file characteristics.
operations.title: Search By Query

parameters.title: Query
parameters.name: query
parameters.tooltip: Specify the query to fetch the analysis records.
parameters.description: Specify the query to fetch the analysis records. Refer this link for more information about query: https://tria.ge/docs/cloud-api/search/
